attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Indie music is bland, senseless and boring and it's dull lack of creativity and dull tone should not be allowed to bore our airwaves and Televisions anymore.   

This petition is in response to the "Ban fall out boy" petition, as if this can be banned then Indie should be first on the list.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
